Token.Abstract: Class used by any tableview that wants to display a favourite or a search result. All that we have to do is set the correct reuse identifier for the cell we want to configure.
Used by any tableview that wants to configure a cell with a movie search result from the NYT API

Parameter.Name: result
Parameter.Abstract: The datasource the cells will be configured with

Token.Abstract: Used by any tableview that wants to configure a cell with a movie from favourites stored with core data

Parameter.Name: result
Parameter.Abstract: The datasource the cells will be configured with
